title: Once Upon A Roommate
description: Ruby Knight brings you Once Upon a Roommate...the first instalment in the Greenmount Giants series.Sometimes situationships are there to test us...Mila Daniels is desperate to escape the wicked clutches of her mom.She's hoping her enrolment at the prestigious Greenmount University will be the much needed escape she needs.Memorable and drama free...Enter Jett Jameson...Greenmount U's very own Hockey hero.He's arrogant...He's obnoxious...And he's also hot as hell....The Greenmount Giant isn't used to hearing the word no. Especially when he's forced to share a room with Mila.Jett Jameson is a demon on the ice, but how will he handle the heat with his new roommate?Once Upon A Roommate tropes include:- Bully Romance- Hockey Romance- Enemies with Benefits- Roommates- Fake Dating- Forced Proximity- Angsty Romance
author: Ruby  Knight
